SELECT * FROM ( SELECT SUM(1) OVER(PARTITION BY NULL) AS TOTAL_RECORD_COUNT, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC) AS RNUM, TB.* FROM ( SELECT A.BLKLST_SEQ, A.USER_ID, A.USER_DVSN, A.USER_CLPHN, A.BLKLST_USER_YN, TO_CHAR(A.FRST_REGIST_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS FRST_REGIST_DTM, A.BLKLST_CANCEL_YN, FN_DETAILCODENM(A.BLKLST_DVSN) AS BLKLST_DVSN, B.USER_PHONE, B.USER_NM FROM TSER_BLKLST_INFO_I A, TSER_USER_INFO_I B WHERE A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID AND A.BLKLST_DVSN = #{params.searchBlklstDvsn, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND A.USER_ID LIKE '%' || #{params.searchKeyword} || '%'
AND B.USER_NM LIKE '%' || #{params.searchKeyword} || '%'
AND B.USER_PHONE LIKE '%' || #{params.searchKeyword} || '%'
AND ( A.USER_ID LIKE '%' || #{params.searchKeyword} || '%' OR B.USER_NM LIKE '%' || #{params.searchKeyword} || '%' OR B.USER_PHONE LIKE '%' || #{params.searchKeyword} || '%' )
ORDER BY A.BLKLST_SEQ DESC ) TB ) TA WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN #{params.firstIndex} + 1 AND #{params.firstIndex} + #{params.recordCountPerPage} ORDER BY TA.RNUM DESC
